name: mlflow_agent_tracking
description: A comprehensive framework for tracking, evaluating, and managing LLM agents using MLflow. This project provides end-to-end pipelines for dataset preprocessing, prompt management, model evaluation, and experiment tracking

name: dynamic_clustering_fl_health_conditions
description: Dynamic Clustering Federated Learning in Concept Drift Scenarios on Health Conditions

name: Carpenter
description: Carpenter is a job scraping tool that extracts job listings from Jobrapido and Glassdoor. It allows users to search for job titles and export the results.
